greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n! * Sum_{d in D(n+1)} (-1)^(d+1)*(n+1)/d, D(n) the divisors of n.
formula: E.g.f.: d/dx log(Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 15 2017
program: A265024 = lambda n: factorial(n)*sum((-1)^(d+1)*(n+1)/d for d in divisors(n+1))
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2016
